name: LoxxBoxx
0:
”Alexa, ask loxx boxx Box temperature”
”Alexa, ask loxx boxx Next delivery”
”Alexa, ask loxx boxx when was my boxx last opened”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: loxx boxx
Developer Terms of Use
des: Introducing the Alexa integration for Loxx Boxx! Experience the next level of package security with this voice-enabled app. Stay updated with real-time activity alerts for your shipments, grant access to carriers using tracking numbers or personal codes, and ensure the safety of your packages against theft, weather, and curious pets. The Loxx Boxx Alexa app also provides instant notifications on box tampering, internal temperature, and battery life. Whether you're at home or away, peace of mind is just a voice command away.
